abilities.name: Mist Resilience
abilities.effect: In mist zones, gain Cover against ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Combat Triage
abilities.effect: 1AP: Heal 2D3 +1 wounds to a friendly operative within 3 inches.

abilities.name: Tidal Surge
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Push 2 inches all enemies within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Inspiring Presence
abilities.effect: Friendly operatives within 6 inches re-roll 1s on attack rolls.

abilities.name: Markerlight
abilities.effect: 1AP: Designate a visible enemy. Allies gain Balanced against it until the end of the Turning Point.

abilities.name: Disgustingly Resilient
abilities.effect: Psychic,Roll 1D6 each time this operative loses a wound. On a 5+, ignore that wound.

abilities.name: Swarm of Filth
abilities.effect: If another Nurgling is within 2 inches, improve WS by 1 for melee attacks.

abilities.name: Nurgle’s Gift
abilities.effect: Psychic, When this operative is destroyed, all enemies within 2 inches suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Terminator Armor
abilities.effect: Ignore movement penalties from terrain. Reduce damage taken from Blast weapons by 1 (to a min of 1).

abilities.name: Overclocked Systems
abilities.effect: Once per battle: Gain +1 APL for one activation. After this activation, suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Bulky Frame
abilities.effect: Cannot climb or perform Dash actions. Enemy operatives cannot move through this operative.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Teleport 6 inches through shadows or mist zones. Treat as Concealed after teleporting.

abilities.name: Soul Hunger
abilities.effect: Psychic, After defeating an enemy, heal 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Umbral Aura
abilities.effect: Enemies within 6 inches worsen their Save by 1 in mist zones.

abilities.name: Terrifying Visage
abilities.effect: Once per battle: All enemies within 6 inches gain Disoriented until the end of the Turning Point.

abilities.name: Veil of Darkness
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Create a 3 inch mist zone. Allies within it gain Silent.

abilities.name: Siphon Essence
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Target enemy within 12 inches suffers 1D3 wounds. Heal equal to the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Living Roots
abilities.effect: 1AP: Create a 3-inch hazardous terrain patch of entangling roots. Enemies moving through suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Bark Armor
abilities.effect: Reduce incoming damage by 1 (to a minimum of 2). Critical hits against this operative are scored on unmodified rolls of 5+.

abilities.name: Sylvan Regrowth
abilities.effect: At the end of each Turning Point, heal 1D3 wounds. If in a mist zone, heal 1D3+1 instead.

abilities.name: Mistform
abilities.effect: Psychic, This operative is always treated as in Cover while in a mist zone. Can move through terrain and other operatives.

abilities.name: Density Shift
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Increase mist density level in a 6-inch radius for one Turning Point. All operatives in the area are Obscured.

abilities.name: Ethereal Strike
abilities.effect: Psychic, Critical hits inflict the Bleeding status. If the target is already Bleeding, worsen it to Corrupted.

abilities.name: Guardian's Call
abilities.effect: Psychic, Once per battle, summon 1D3 Sylvan Saplings within 6 inches. Saplings activate after this operative.

abilities.name: Thorn Burst
abilities.effect: When this operative is destroyed, all enemies within 3 inches suffer 1D3 wounds and gain Bleeding.

abilities.name: Mist Vortex
abilities.effect: At the start of its activation, pull all operatives within 6 inches 2 inches closer. Roll 1D6 for each; on a 5+, they suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.effect: PSYCHIC: 1AP: Create a 4-inch hazardous warp rift on a place visible and within 12 inches. Enemies entering or starting their activation roll 1d6, on a 1-5 they suffer result wounds.

abilities.name: Unyielding Fog
abilities.effect: Mist zones within 12 inches cannot be dispersed. All mist effects are treated as Dense density.

abilities.name: Psychic Abomination
abilities.effect: Enemy operatives within 6 inches cannot use Psychic actions and worsen WS by 1 of spell operatives.

abilities.name: Silent Judge
abilities.effect: Once per Turning Point, select an enemy within 12 inches. Until your next activation, all attacks against this target gain +1 WS.

abilities.name: Null Charge
abilities.effect: 1AP: Perform Charge action through terrain. If charging a [spell] operative, retain one additional attack die.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flame
abilities.effect: When attacking [spell] operatives, critical hits apply /3/ (Burning) status automatically.

abilities.name: Psychic Dominion
abilities.effect: 1AP: Select visible enemy within 12 inches. Until next activation, their [spell] attacks targeting this operative automatically fail.

abilities.name: Inquisitorial Mandate
abilities.effect: 2AP: friendly operatives within 6 inches can immediately perform a free Fight or Shoot action after this operative's activation.

abilities.name: Sanctioned Tactics
abilities.effect: When within 3 inches of an Inquisitor, improve WS by 1.

abilities.name: Bound Wrath
abilities.effect: Each time this operative suffers wounds, add +1 to its Attack characteristic (max +3). If controller is killed, roll 1D6 each activation - on 1-3 it attacks nearest operative.

abilities.name: Warp Flux
abilities.effect: In mist zones, gain Fly 8 inches but suffer 1 wound at end of each activation. Critical hits apply /7/ (Corrupted) status.

abilities.name: Authority of the Ordos
abilities.effect: Once per Turning Point, one friendly operative withint 6 inches can reroll a failed dice

abilities.name: Sanctioned Vigilance
abilities.effect: When within 3 inches of another Inquisitorial Agent, gain +1 to Save rolls

abilities.name: Warp Insight
abilities.effect: 1AP: Roll 1D6 - on 4+ remove change to engange enemies within 12 inches.

abilities.name: Unstable Connection
abilities.effect: When using [spell] weapons, suffer 1 wound on hit rolls of 1
